title: It's really sad.
body:
That Bramble's Vest alone, is more useful than the old Thornmail.

I honestly don't know why we had old Thornmail as long as we did, the new one feels like cool spring water after crawling for weeks through the desert.
Meanwhile, _"Better re-haul all lethality items gents!... again."_

_(is this the 3rd or 4th time now that they've been completely reworked? You'd think that if they cant be balanced by now, they may have been a mistake to begin with..)_

Sarcasm and prejudice aside though, thank you for the new Thornmail!

replies.body:
Personally i miss the old "premit damage reflection" mechanic.

Like id be fine if they knocked a few percent off it and gave us like "10% damage taken from hits"

Because atm when im using thornmail i actually dont even notice it, unless im building some off the wall 600 armor build that isnt feasible because its 1. too expensive for tanks and 2. has no mr or health.
